text: Fritz Fuchs (born 18 October 1943, in Kaiserslautern) is a German former football coach and player. As a player, he spent six seasons in the Bundesliga with 1. FC Kaiserslautern. As a coach, his biggest success was managing FC 08 Homburg to their promotion to the Bundesliga. ==Honours as a player== * DFB- Pokal finalist: 1971â€“72 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:German football managers Category:Kickers Offenbach managers Category:Arminia Bielefeld managers Category:Rot-Weiss Essen managers Category:SC Freiburg managers Category:1. title: Fritz Fuchs
